chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 mini has the above problem:
Good day
I can't reach anyone at UPS! They won't allow any rescheduling, no matter why. I would like you to take care of this. I've already told them that nobody is home before 3 PM except on Fridays. And yesterday, I didn't receive a delivery. The fact is they will definitely try again on Monday when nobody is at home.
Thank you very much for your help,

Hi ecomobile,

The parcel will be returned to you.

Can you send the parcel again, but via DHL?

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Fabio Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

According to the tracking link, the delivery has already been postponed at the request of the customer. Would the customer like us to inform our logistics partner to hold off delivery until Friday 7 June?

Regards,
RK

Hi ecomobile,

The customer hasn't put anything off.

The parcel simply won't be delivered.

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Fabio Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

According to the tracking link, the parcel was successfully delivered on 4th June. Kindly confirm if the customer has received the parcel. If not, kindly assist the customer in preparing a handwritten CND with the IMEI of the device and their ID, then we will contact our logistics partner. Thank you.
https://www.ups.com/track?loc=de_de&requester=QUIC&tracknum=1ZBF1560D901136893/trackdetails

Regards,
JY
